content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) facing UP with drop position (40.5, -83.5)
- Wooden chest at (42.5, -81.5)
- Burner inserter at (39.5, -81.5) facing LEFT
System status: Not operational (drill and inserter have no fuel)

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) facing DOWN with drop position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
System status: drill not working (no fuel)

### Copper Plate Production at (-20.5, -71.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at (-20.5, -71.5) containing 2 copper ore

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-14.5, 15.5) facing UP
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) containing 200 units of water at 15°
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components:
  - Empty pipe group at (-14.5, 12.5)
  - Water-filled pipe group at (-16.5, 19.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (-9.5, 20.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (5.5, 25.5)
- Electric pole network connecting broader system
System status:
- Steam engine not receiving electricity
- Boiler out of fuel
- Offshore pump working

### Research Facility
- Lab containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics technology
- No power due to steam engine issues

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Harvesting Issues
- Direct coal harvesting attempts failing despite being at correct coordinates
- Ensure exact positioning when attempting to harvest resources
- Moving slightly around resource tiles does not improve harvesting success
- Resource harvesting requires precise positioning and correct reach distance

### Entity Placement and Configuration Issues
- Verify position is clear before placing new entities
- When replacing entities, ensure proper removal of old entity first
- Ensure proper alignment between drills and their output chests
- Consider drill orientation when setting up mining operations

### Fuel Management Issues
- Cannot insert items into entities without being next to them
- Cannot extract from drill's burner inventory directly
- Stone and other raw materials cannot be used as fuel
- Iron plates cannot be used as fuel in burner devices
- Monitor fuel levels in all fuel-consuming entities

### Crafting Issues
- Cannot craft items when recipe is not properly initialized
- Handle nil values in recipe and crafting operations appropriately
- Verify recipe availability before attempting to craft

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Address "no input liquid" warnings in steam engine

### API Usage Issues
- Handle nil values appropriately in recipe and crafting operations
- Verify entity existence before attempting operations
- Check inventory contents before attempting to use items
- Ensure proper attribute access when working with positions

### Research Issues
- Cannot start already researched technologies
- Monitor research progress for currently researching technology
- Lab requires power to function
